# [Interview #1094: Salt Lake City Comic-Con 2014, Entry #55](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1094#55)

#### Question

Have we seen a physical personification of Odium like how Vin was...

#### Brandon Sanderson

You have not.
